alert.note: Alert for Central Colorado River Basin; Elkhead and Park Mountains; Gore and Elk Mountains, Central Mountain Valleys (Colorado) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS GrandJunction (Western Colorado and Eastern Utah)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued May 26 at 2:17PM MDT by NWS GrandJunction
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of central Eagle and northeastern Pitkin Counties through 300 PM MDT... At 216 PM MDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm 10 miles east of Snowmass, or 30 miles east of Glenwood Springs, moving north at 30 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 50 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Eagle and Avon. This includes the following highways... Interstate 70 in Colorado between mile markers 144 and 174. Colorado 82 between mile markers 27 and 48, and between mile markers 50 and 52. Colorado 131 between mile markers 1 and 21. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.

area.areaDesc: Central Colorado River Basin; Elkhead and Park Mountains; Gore and Elk Mountains, Central Mountain Valleys
